title: HELP PLS League not allowing my friend to sign in
body: Its just telling him he has the wrong info but I typed in the exact password and username on mine and it worked......help pls

replies.body:
There are a few different things that could cause issues while logging in. Have your friend check out our [Login Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues) for some steps that may help.

If your friend still has issues, have them create their own post about this.
